### What's Hanoman?
<b>Hanoman</b> is an GUI antivirus engine singature based. The signatures that the Hanoman uses come from [VirusShare](https://virusshare.com/)

---

## Features 
- GUI Scanner
- Directory Scan
- Computer Scan
- Quarantine

## Installation
```bash
# Clone this repo
git clone https://github.com/hrtywhy/Hanoman.git
```

## Usage
```
root@plankton: hanoman.py
```
